subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The former race leader Jean-Pierre Dick was forced to retire from the Vendée Globe round-the-world race. Dick, who led the race on four occasions, had to drop out when his yacht, Paprec-Virbac, hit an unidentified object, which caused irreparable damage to the rudder.
